data.text:
When Arthur Wellesley MacDonald was born on 24 January 1898, in Hallowell Township, Prince Edward, Ontario, Canada, his father, Frederick Eugene Mcdonald, was 36 and his mother, Emma Augusta Christy, was 34. He had at least 1 son with Edith Winifred Hill. He lived in Saskatchewan, Canada in 1916. He died on 17 February 1981, in Melfort, Star City No. 428, Saskatchewan, Canada, at the age of 83, and was buried in Silver Park, Pleasantdale No. 398, Saskatchewan, Canada.
